response.overview: After a failed suicide attempt in his garage, former criminal Henrik ends up at the local gas station. Here, during a conversation with the annoying tank passer Gitte, he becomes involved in a robbery committed by inexperienced Ronja. However, it does not go as planned and has major consequences for the three involved.
response.tagline: A retired gangster in the middle of a midlife crisis wants the excitement back in his life.
response.title: Dødbringende Diesel
